featured.title: NANDA: The Agentic Web
featured.description: Overview of NANDA's approach to building decentralized AI infrastructure. Covers the five core principles and demonstrates practical applications in agent discovery and coordination.

conference_talks.title: Decentralized AI: 2024 Overview
conference_talks.description: Comprehensive overview of decentralized AI research and applications. Discusses current challenges and future directions in agent-based systems.

conference_talks.title: Worldwide Web of AI Agents: Introducing NANDA
conference_talks.description: Introduction to NANDA's vision for a worldwide web of AI agents. Explores the technical infrastructure needed for global agent coordination.

technical_demos.title: Augmented Surgeons and 'Anatome': AI & AR for IA
technical_demos.description: Demonstration of AI agents in augmented reality applications for medical training. Shows practical implementation of decentralized AI in specialized domains.
